excerpt: "Ai Weiwei's \"astonishing\" and long-awaited memoir 1000 Years of Joys and Sorrows will be published by The Bodley Head on 2nd November 2021 with a cover designed by the artist himself. It will be translated into 13 languages with rights already placed in 15 markets."
